featureType.name: pumping_station
featureType.title: pumping_station
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: pumping_station
virtualTable.sql: SELECT a.pumpingstation_id as "Pumping Station ID" , a.wss_id as "WSS ID" , b.wss_name as "WSS Name" , a.construction_year as "Construction Year" , a.rehabilitation_year as "Rehabilitation Year" , CASE WHEN a.water_meter = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Meter Installation" , a.meter_installation_date as "Meter Installation Date" , a.pump_installation_date as "Pump Installation Date" , a.head_pump as "Head of Pump(m)" , a.power_pump as "Power of Pump(kW)" , a.discharge_pump as "Discharge of Pump(m3)" , a.pump_type as "Type of Pump" , a.power_source as "Source of Power" , a.no_pump as "Number of Pumps" , a.kva as "kVA of Generator" , a.no_generator as "Number of Generator" , a.observation as "Observation" , a.input_date as "Inputted Date" , a.geom , a.elevation as "Elevation" ,CASE WHEN a.chlorination_unit = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END as "Installation of Chlorination Unit" , a.status FROM pumping_station a INNER JOIN wss b ON a.wss_id = b.wss_id
